app_description.message: Viber's share button allows 'Viber Desktop' users to easily share web sites, Photos and Text directly from the browser

error_button.description: The download button in the error popup

error_message_body.message:
An error has occured due to one of the following reasons:
1. You don't have Viber for desktop on your computer.
2. You don't have an updated version of Viber for desktop.
3. You didn't approve the external permission.

error_message_title.description: The title of the timeout error popup

open_viber_message_body.description: The description of the open viber popup
open_viber_message_body.message: To share content through the Viber chrome extension you need to make sure the latest version of Viber is up and running on your desktop.

open_viber_message_button.description: The download button in the open viber popup

open_viber_message_title.description: The title of the open viber popup
open_viber_message_title.message: Is Viber open on your desktop?

options_hide_image_button.description: The caption for the option to hide the hovering button for images
options_hide_image_button.message: Hide hovering Share button on images

options_hide_text_button.description: The caption for the option to hide the hovering button for selected text
options_hide_text_button.message: Hide hovering Share button on selection of text

options_title.description: The title of the options page

share_context.description: The text of the context menu item
